title: How do I choose the content?
excerpt: Use Select to choose the content. Next, you enter information about the and to
content:
Use Select to choose the content. Next, you enter information about the content and add the content to your course.

Important: Make sure the content is correct before selecting it. Otherwise, you'll have to start again from your course. To look for different content, enter search terms in the box at the top of the page.
